page.title: 20Schools
page.content:
Altogether there are 13 Nursery,First and Middle (8-12) Schools within the area with 3 Secondary Comprehensives. The oldest dates back to 1855, but new ones have been built as more and more housing is developed.
The children who have compiled this part of the survey come from two such contrasting schools:
{Croft Middle School,}Northumberland Avenue, built on a new estate some 7 years ago; and
{Queen's Middle School,}Queeen's Road, built on the outskirts of Nuneaton Town Centre in the late 19th century.
